Scene:
The Daimonjiya Cotton Shop
(Daimonjiya / 大文字屋)

Play: The Faithful Wife (紙子仕立両面鑑)

Production: September 1973

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Komatsudayū II (豊竹小松大夫 (二))

Takemoto Koshijidayū IV (竹本越路大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Kanotarō (鶴澤叶太郎)

Nozawa Kizaemon II (野澤喜左衛門 (二))
